Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: Hareliko
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights 140 close entrance close car breakfast nice variety hotel clean fairly close downtown dallas hotel offers shuttle services staff nice welcoming

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”
Reviews.Author: mmhaugland
Reviews.Content: family stayed night town mavericks basketball game chose due convenient location game walking distance american airlines center easy mile drive beds comfortable clean staff friendly lady desk tiffany extremely helpful directions suggestions breakfast taking care breakfast friendly kept stocked

Reviews.Title: “Nice staff, missing some things other Fairfields have”
Reviews.Author: eastcoastgirlforever
Reviews.Content: front desk excellent parking lot little funky courtyard error courtyard prominent pulling lot fairfield entrance bathroom sink outside toilettub ok tired sleep didnt freezer blue ice packs overnight departure helpful driving 15 hour days sodas food fresh overall ok staff nice quiet sleep

HotelInfo.Name: Fairfield Inn Dallas Market Center
HotelInfo.Address: 2110 Market Center Boulevard, at Stemmons, Dallas, TX 75207
